00018 #ifndef _CONT_KMC_H
00019 #define _CONT_KMC_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00022 #include <votca/kmcold/vertex.h>
00023 #include <votca/kmcold/hoppers.h>
00024 #include <votca/kmcold/kmc.h>
00025 #include <votca/kmcold/graph.h>
00026 #include <time.h>
00027 
00028 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00029 
00030 class ContKmc : public QMCalculator{
00031 public:
00032     ContKmc() {};
00033     ~ContKmc() {};
00034 
00035     const char *Description() { return "Run the old Kinetic Monte Carlo code"; }
00036 
00037     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00038     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00039 
00040 private:
00042     vec _E;
00044     double _total_time;
00046     double _alpha;
00048     double _dt;
00050     int _ncrg;
00052     int _nruns;
00054     ofstream _out_cont;
00055     ofstream _out_diff;
00056     unsigned int _seed;
00058     void make_kmc_graph(QMTopology *top, graph *a, QMNBList &nblist);
00059 };
00060 
00061 inline void ContKmc::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options){
00063     _E = options->get("options.calc_rates.e_field").as<vec>();
00064 
00066     _total_time = options->get("options.kmc_cont.total_time").as<double>();
00067     _dt = options->get("options.kmc_cont.dt").as<double>();
00068     _alpha = options->get("options.kmc_cont.alpha").as<double>();
00069     _ncrg = options->get("options.kmc_cont.ncrg").as<int>();
00070     _nruns = options->get("options.kmc_cont.nruns").as<int>();
00071 
00072     _seed = time(NULL)%0xFFFFFFFF;
00073     if(options->exists("options.kmc_cont.seed"))
00074         _seed = options->get("options.kmc_cont.seed").as<unsigned int>();
00075 
00077     _out_cont.open("kmc_cont.res");
00078     _out_diff.open("kmc_diff.res");
00079     if(_out_cont!=0){
00080         _out_cont << "# seed for random number generator: " << _seed << endl;
00081         _out_cont << "# number of run, time [sec], average velocity [m/s], mobility [cm^2/sec], electric field [V/m], end to end vector [nm]" << endl;
00082     }
00083     if(_out_diff!=0){
00084         _out_diff << "# time [sec], displacement in x, y and z direction [m]" << endl;
00085     }
00086     _out_cont.close();
00087     _out_diff.close();
00088 
00090     // \todo this routine is shitty, replace it!
00091     // according to marsaglia paper, choosing 4 initial values out of range
00092     // demanded by the generator will
00093     // give satisfactory results, however doesn't guarantee same execution on
00094     // different machins. This also applies for rand() which might be specific
00095     // for different architectures.
00096     srand(_seed);
00097     Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline bool ContKmc::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top){
00102     QMNBList &nblist = top->nblist();
00103     graph kmc_grid;
00104     make_kmc_graph(top,&kmc_grid,nblist);
00105     kmc_grid.setGeneratorsOnly();
00106     hoppers charges(&kmc_grid);
00107     charges.setRecordOcc(true);
00108 
00110     KMCAlg kmc_alg(_total_time, _dt, _alpha, _ncrg, &charges);
00111     cout << "Starting continuos KMC." << endl;
00112 
00114     kmc_alg.kmcPBC(_nruns, _out_cont, _out_diff);
00115 
00116     // copy back occupation probabilities
00117     vector<vertex*>::iterator it = kmc_grid.getFirstVertex();
00118 
00119     for (; it != kmc_grid.getLastVertex(); ++it) {
00120         QMCrgUnit *crg = top->getCrgUnit((*it)->getCrgUnitId());
00121         if(crg == NULL)
00122             throw std::runtime_error("did not find crgunit id given in kmc graph");
00123         crg->setOccupationProbability(charges.getOccProbability(*it));
00124     }
00125 
00126 
00127     cout << "Finished continuous KMC." << endl;
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline void ContKmc::make_kmc_graph(QMTopology *top, graph *a, QMNBList &nblist) {
00131     cout << "[make_kmc_graph]: Building KMC Graph...";
00133     a->SetField(_E);
00135     vector < QMCrgUnit *> &listCharges = top->CrgUnits();
00136     vector < QMCrgUnit *>::iterator it;
00137     for (it = listCharges.begin(); it != listCharges.end(); ++it) {
00138         vertex *v = a->AddVertex((*it)->GetCom(), _E); 
00139         v->setCrgUnitId((*it)->getId());
00140     }
00142     for (QMNBList::iterator iter = nblist.begin(); iter != nblist.end(); ++iter) {
00143         a->AddEdge((*iter)->first->getId(), (*iter)->second->getId(), (*iter)->rate12(), (*iter)->r());
00144         a->AddEdge((*iter)->second->getId(), (*iter)->first->getId(), (*iter)->rate21(), -(*iter)->r());
00145     }
00146     cout << " Done." << endl;
00147 }
00148 
00149 }}
